data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Kollam, Kerala, India to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kollam, Kerala, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 28,989 believers in Kollam against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the county of Kollam, Kerala, India.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 28,989 believers in Kollam, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Arasar people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, help every believer in Kollam, Kerala, India be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 2,606,410 lost in Kollam that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.section_summary:
the county of Kollam, Kerala, India has a population of 2,635,400.

We estimate Kollam has 28,989 people who might know Jesus, 31,976 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,574,434 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Kollam
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.
